### Basic git commands:

- **git clone "HTTPS"** (to download to your computer a github repository)

- **git status** (to control if your local folder is up tp date with the main github repository)

- **git add .** (adds new local changes to the github repository)

- **git commit -m"my_comment"** (adds the comment to what you will upload)

- **git push** (everything added is pushed to the github repository, and if it' a public repo, it becomes public)

- **git pull** (it downloads files that are ahead in the main github repo if your local folder is behind)
